channel.title: Parts Attachments_bucket on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Parts Attachments_bucket on Universal

item.title: K01732
item.description: Geith ditch cleaning bucket, width 182Cm, new cutting edge, pin diameter 80mm, distance between hinges 330mm. Bucket is in very good condition.

item.title: K01739
item.description: Scott ditch cleaning bucket, width 213Cm, pin diameter 80mm, distance between hinges 305mm, weld on cutting edge. Bucket is in good condition.

item.title: K01742
item.description: Ditch cleaning bucket, width 211Cm, pin diameter 80mm, distance between hinges 305mm, weld on cutting edge. Bucket is in good condition.

item.title: K02450
item.description: Brand new Delta DLG980G log fork for wheelloader. Specially designed to comfortably and safely handle most severe logging applications. The tines are made of Hardox steel for maximum strength and excellent resistance to impact and abrasion. Custom build options are available for any brand and type of wheel loader.

item.title: K02492
item.description: GP bucket with teeth to suit Cat 330D or similar size excavator, width 68Cm, pin diameter 100mm - 90mm, distance between hinges 390mm, including pins. Bucket is in excellent condition and has new paint.

item.title: K02931
item.description: Brand new Delta DLG420 log fork for wheelloader. Specially designed to comfortably and safely handle most severe logging applications. The tines are made of Hardox steel for maximum strength and excellent resistance to impact and abrasion. Custom build options are available for any brand and type of wheel loader.

item.title: K03025
item.description: Geith ditch cleaning bucket, width 244Cm, bolt on cutting edge, pin diameter 80mm, distance between hinges 350mm. Bucket is in good condition.

item.title: K03423
item.description: Scott ditch cleaning bucket, width 243Cm, pin diameter 90mm.

item.title: K03716
item.description: Ditch cleaning bucket with cutting edge, width 210 Cm, pin diameter 80mm, dipper 310mm, centres 445mm.

item.title: K03793
item.description: Narrow GP bucket with teeth to suit backhoe or mini excavator, bucket width 46 Cm. Quick release hangers. Bucket is in good and clean condition.

item.title: K03850
item.description: Volvo L220F Heavy duty rock bucket with teeth, completely refurbished bucket, new bucket tips, new paint. Bucket is immediately available!

item.title: K03932
item.description: Bucket to suit Caterpillar 320BL, bucket width 204 Cm, pin size 80mm, stick 320mm.

item.title: K03999
item.description: Rockland volume bucket to fit Cat 980G wheel loader.

item.title: K04003
item.description: New and unused Heavy duty Esco cutting edge with tips to fit excavator bucket, width 1.22 Mtr, thickness 50mm.

item.title: K04097
item.description: Bucket with teeth to suit 20-30 Ton excavator, 1.45 m3 capacity, including new Verachtert CW-40 hangers.

item.title: K04203
item.description: Cat bucket with teeth & cutting edge to suit Cat 345CL or similar size excavator, bucket width 1.10 Mtr, pin sizes 110mm / 90mm, stick width 490mm.

item.title: K04259
item.description: Geith bucket with teeth, pin size 80mm, stick width 310mm, bucket width 63 Cm, CE marked. Bucket is in good condition.

item.title: K04264
item.description: Ditch cleaning bucket to suit 20-25 Ton excavator, width 203Cm, pins 80mm, stick width 310mm.

item.title: K04274
item.description: Ditch cleaning bucket to suit 20-25 Ton excavator, cutting edge, pins 80mm, stick width 310mm. Bucket is in good and clean condition.

item.title: K04288
item.description: Ditch cleaning bucket with bolt on cutting edge, pin size 80mm, stick width 310mm, bucket width 2.10 Mtr.

item.title: K04299
item.description: New GP bucket with teeth to suit 12-15 Ton excavator, bucket width 1.25 Mtr (48”), pin diameter 65mm, stick width 260mm, pin centers 420mm.

item.title: K04357
item.description: New heavy duty bucket with teeth and side cutters to fit Cat 345B/350B or similar size excavator, bucket width 1.47 Mtr (58”), pin diameter 100-80mm, stick width 440mm, pin centers 550mm.

item.title: K04359
item.description: New heavy duty bucket with teeth and side cutters to fit Cat 320 / Volvo EC210 / Hyundai R210 or similar size excavator, bucket width 1.14 Mtr, pin diameter 80mm, stick width 325mm, pin centers 460mm.

item.title: K04361
item.description: GP bucket to suit 12-15 Ton excavator, bucket width 1.20 Mtr, pin diameter 65mm, stick width 260mm, pin centers 390mm.

item.title: K04370
item.description: New & unused Strickland GP excavator bucket to fit 20-25 Ton excavator, pins 80mm, stick width 310mm, pin centers 450mm. Several units available from stock!

item.title: K04400
item.description: GP bucket with cutting edge, bucket width 1.06 Mtr.

item.title: K04405
item.description: Hydraulic tilt bucket with cutting edge, bucket width 2.20 Mtr, Verachtert CW40 quick coupler connection, incl. hydraulic hoses / quick release fittings.

item.title: K04525
item.description: Ditch cleaning bucket with cutting edge to suit Cat 336⁄340 or similar size excavator, fits Cat TB linkage, bucket width 2.50 Mtr, pin diameter 100-80mm, stick width 441mm, pin centers 587mm, CE marked. Bucket is in as-new condition.

item.title: K04526
item.description: Ditch cleaning bucket with cutting edge to suit Cat 336⁄340 or similar size excavator, fits Cat DB linkage, bucket width 2.50 Mtr, pin diameter 100-90mm, stick width 385mm, pin centers 500mm, CE marked. Bucket is in as-new condition.

item.title: K04527
item.description: Ditch cleaning bucket with cutting edge to suit Cat 336⁄340 or similar size excavator, fits Cat DB linkage, bucket width 2.50 Mtr, pin diameter 100-90mm, stick width 385mm, pin centers 500mm, CE marked. Bucket is in as-new condition.

item.title: K04542
item.description: Caterpillar bucket with teeth to fit Cat 320E or similar size excavator, bucket width 1.42 Mtr, pin diameter 80mm, stick width 315mm, pin centers 445mm. Cat part number 468-4327

item.title: K04580
item.description: New and unused heavy duty Geith digging bucket with teeth to suit 35-45 Ton excavator, bucket with 1.70 Mtr (66”), bucket capacity 2.17 M3, pin diameter 100mm, stick width 410mm, pin centers 555mm, lifting eye SWL 35.000 Kg, CE marked. Bucket is immediately available from stock!
